query.name: listByName
query.sql: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.role_id, u.user_code FROM SYS_USER u #WHERE_CLAUSE#

query.name: enabled
query.sql: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.role_id, u.user_code FROM SYS_USER u where u.status='Y' order by u.user_code

query.name: disabled
query.sql: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.role_id, u.user_code FROM SYS_USER u where u.status='N' order by u.user_code

sqls.batchExecuteSql: INSERT INTO sys_user (user_code, user_name, password, role_id, status, create_by, create_date, last_update_by, last_update_date) VALUES #BATCH_TEMPLATE_BEGIN# (${@user_code}, ${@user_name}, ${@password}, ${@role_id}, ${@status}, 2, NOW(), 2, NOW()) #BATCH_TEMPLATE_END# on duplicate key update last_update_date = now(), user_name = values(user_name)
